text: Nagaland is a northeastern state in the Republic of India. It has an area of . It is bigger than East Timor but smaller than Eswatini. In traditional Indian geography it falls under the North-east Indian zone. ==Provincial symbols of Nagaland== Image:Tragopan blythii01.jpg|Provincial bird of Nagaland |Provincial animal of Nagaland Image:Alnus incana rugosa leaves.jpg|Provincial tree of Nagaland Image:Rhododendron-by-eiffel-public- domain-20040617.jpg|Provincial flower of Nagaland == References ==
title: Nagaland
